stories.title: New Birmingham shop allows customers to borrow instead of buy

stories.text:
I'm looking for an old school reliable, low cost, shared hosting provider for simple projects and websites. (with WordPress supporting, ie LAMP, LEMP) There's so many companies out there, and I have my own biases and experiences with many of them... I'm wondering what the crowd here recommends.

No, I'm not looking for a $5 VPS, I don't want to bother with managing and maintaining a server, I'd rather just have a turnkey solution where I can set up domains or subdomains as needed without having to maintain a server myself.
stories.title: Ask HN: Shared Hosting Recommendations
